cave.domain

Class CaveMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cave.domain.CaveMapper

  • public class CaveMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    The CaveMapper class provides functions for generating main caves and sub-caves. mainCaves: generates the main caves by making sure that every level has at the least one cave. subCaves: These are the lesser caves that are either adjacent to each other or to a main cave. Sub caves are randomised by randomly checking which cave in the cavern has an empty sleeve next, above or below it and randomly choosing one of these directions to place the next sub room.

      Constructs the Mapper for the cavern.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CaveMapper

        public CaveMapper(int depth)
        Constructs the Mapper for the cavern. Sets up all the neccissary lists and tables to build two lists of caverns.
        Parameters:
        depth - how deep the cavern will be.

    • Method Detail

      • mainCaves

        public MyList mainCaves()
        This method generates the main-cavern, by building a spine-like structure by choosing at least 1 room per level and a random amount of adjacent main rooms. Time complexity O(3n), because sleeves size is equal to depth so no doubleSize can happen.
        Returns:
        A List of main-caves

      • createNewSleeve

        public Sleeve createNewSleeve(int numberForNewSleeve)
        Creates a sleeve and adds it to the sleeve pools.
        Parameters:
        numberForNewSleeve - the number of the sleeve
        Returns:
        the new Sleeve that was created.

      • subCaves

        public MyList subCaves()
        This method is responsible for generating the sub-cavern by randomly choosing vacant adjacent sleeves, and adding to that list as more caves are generated. The amount of rooms has been limited to 25 percent of the depth. Time complexity O(n)
        Returns:
        List of sub-Caves.

      • getNeighbouringFreeSleeves

        public MyList getNeighbouringFreeSleeves(int number)
        Time complexity O(1)
        Parameters:
        number - of the sleeve that is being checked for vacant neighbouring Sleeves.
        Returns:
        numbers of vacant surrounding sleeves.

      • isEmptySleeve

        public boolean isEmptySleeve(int number)
        Time complexity O(1)
        Parameters:
        number - corresponding Sleeve
        Returns:
        if said Sleeve is vacant

      • chooseSleeve

        public java.lang.Integer chooseSleeve(MyList<java.lang.Integer> sleeveNumbers)
        Time complexity O(1)
        Parameters:
        sleeveNumbers - available vacant sleeves.
        Returns:
        The new Sleeve number that was chosen
